title: New Virtual Classroom Guidelines
content:
Virtual classrooms are an integral part of modern education, and our updated guidelines aim to make the experience more effective and engaging.

Key Updates:

  • Instructors must provide detailed agendas before sessions.
  • Students are required to keep their cameras on unless otherwise instructed.
  • New tools for collaboration, including breakout rooms and interactive whiteboards.

Please review the complete guidelines on the school's portal and ensure adherence starting from 20 November 2024.

title: Interactive Quizzes
content:
We are excited to announce the launch of interactive quizzes on our learning platform, designed to enhance engagement and learning outcomes.

Features:

  • Real-time feedback for each question.
  • Gamification elements to make learning fun.
  • Leaderboards for friendly competition.

Students can start using the feature immediately. Please check the platform's tutorial section for a guide on creating and taking quizzes.

title: Update on Peer Learning Days
content:
Peer Learning Days are being revamped to encourage more collaborative and interactive sessions.

New Highlights:

  • Dedicated mentors to guide group discussions.
  • Pre-session materials to prepare for the day.
  • Post-session assessments to measure outcomes.

The next Peer Learning Day is scheduled for 20 November 2024. Don't forget to review the preparation materials shared on the portal.

title: Online Exam Protocol Update
content:
The school has introduced updated protocols for online exams to ensure integrity and smooth conduct of assessments.

Important Changes:

  • Mandatory use of proctoring software during exams.
  • Restricted access to additional devices or browsers.
  • Improved guidelines for technical troubleshooting during exams.

These changes will be effective from the December 2024 examination session. Please review the detailed protocol document on the portal.

title: Graduation Ceremony
content:
We are thrilled to announce the Graduation Ceremony for the Class of 2024, celebrating their incredible achievements.

Event Details:

  • Date: 20 December 2024
  • Venue: Main Auditorium
  • Guests: Families are welcome.

Please RSVP by 10 December 2024 and check the portal for event guidelines and dress code.

title: News on the Book Fair
content:
The annual Book Fair is back with exciting additions and opportunities for all book enthusiasts.

Event Highlights:

  • Discounts on bestselling titles.
  • Author meet-and-greet sessions.
  • Workshops on creative writing and storytelling.

The fair will be held from 15 to 20 November 2024 at the school library. Don't miss this chance to explore and indulge in the world of books!
